reviews.title: Full of Bugs
reviews.text: To be honest, you might as well call the pro shop to book a tee time. This app has more bugs than a trash dumpster !

reviews.title: Worst app ever
reviews.text: Worst app ever

reviews.title: Basically useless
reviews.text: When I try to use the app to book a tee time the keyboard pops up and covers some of the data entry fields so I can’t see what I am typing, and there is o way to scroll. Further, there is no way within the app to report issues

reviews.title: Not ready for prime time
reviews.text: Since replacing the prior app with this one at the beginning of the year,  weekly upgrades just seem to produce new glitches every week.  This app has not properly functioned at any point.  Now currently unable to cancel reservations outside 24 hours.  When attempting to cancel, app confirms they are cancelled but somehow the reservation continues to appear.  Only way to cancel is to call pro shop and have them cancel.

reviews.title: Worst app I have ever used
reviews.text: This is the worst app I have ever used. So much worse than the previous version used by MCG. Hard to make reservations. Hard to add fellow golfers to reservation. Reservations get lost. This is terrible. I have emailed the course multiple times about returning to the prior version.

reviews.title: Downgrade
reviews.text: Last MCG app was much more user friendly. Hard to book tee times and easier for people to mass book times a week out.

reviews.title: terrible app
reviews.text: it won’t let me add my card to reserve a tee time, this app is horrendous.

reviews.title: Worst app ever
reviews.text: There are too many problems with this app to even list. And if I did list them tomorrow the list would be obsolete as they “fix” the app by creating new and even more frustrating problems. Whoever hired this company to create it better be enjoying some lush vacations or have some extra zeros in their bank account. If not they are as incompetent as the designers of this garbage app and not simply corrupt. Though I guess they fit in today’s America where some combination of incompetence and corruption is par for the course. Pun intended.

reviews.title: Perhaps the worst app ever
reviews.text: This app is atrocious.  I've tried several times to save a payment method.  It claims my card was approved, but then, when I submit for a tee time, it claims I need to add a payment method.  Additionally, it does not show the actual tee times available.  MoCo should get a fill refund.  Truly the worst app I've ever attempted to use.

reviews.title: Needs a lot of Work
reviews.text: This app, which is still fairly new, needs a lot of work.  MoCo golfers deserve much better

reviews.title: Terrible user experience
reviews.text: Can someone please explain why the county completely changed an app that worked perfectly fine for something that’s appears to be created by a 6th grader.  I’m sorry, that’s an insult to sixth graders. This app is so bad.  The only thing it does (and barely) is secure tee times. You can not request notifications when retimes become available.  That feature alone is worth its weight in gold.  Gone.  You can no longer purchase the discount packages on the app.  There’s a “store” but good luck finding anything in there.  Blank white page.  Gone.  Golf is already hard enough.  Finding tee times can be a trial of patience and persistence.  You can no longer add a golfer and have them email a confirmation to  your playing partners.  Why MCG is going backwards and providing a worse user experience is beyond comprehension.  Get it together and go back to the old app please.

reviews.title: Terrible app
reviews.text: This app is terrible. Why would I want to book a tee time at 10pm? Why can’t I easily to get to my tee time reservations? Why does the week start on Monday?

reviews.title: Really bad - did you test at all ?
reviews.text: Tee time don’t open timely , website has times open that don’t show up on app. Tee time hour when searching defaults to exactly the current time , even when picking a future date. App has signed me out but doesn’t have Face ID. Don’t even know what to say about how app interacts with the register at the golf course. Course staff basically has to key in the correct price every time I arrive. Half dozen other poorly designed or non existed features in this app.

reviews.title: Never work correctly
reviews.text: Since this new app replaces the chronology, it never works correctly with my acct. very lousy developer and it looks like a high school kids works

reviews.title: World’s worst app?
reviews.text: This might be the worst app on Apple.

reviews.title: I hope someone has been fired …
reviews.text: Nearly impossible to review this app because every time I try a new “feature,” I find a new bug. Try to make a reservation, it asks for a credit card — but returns an error when you enter it. Try to select a tee time when it comes open (the only way to get early tee times), and the date is grayed out. Ask to update your payment method, and it says you haven’t selected a course. Huh? I hope someone got a big kickback or a fat contract for a family member to develop this, because otherwise, there should be a lawsuit and multiple firings. It’s an abomination.

reviews.title: Total downgrade
reviews.text: Wish I could leave a zero star. I have never left a review before, but I’m so frustrated I feel obligated to. This ‘new’ app is a such downgrade from the previous one I don’t know where to begin. The app is the opposite of user friendly. It doesn’t display accurate/consistent data. For example, I can be standing next to my buddy searching the same time period I am for the same course/same day/same number of plays and it displays different times. It continuously prompts that having a card on file is required to reserve a time but failed to add multiple cards, after multiple attempts. Very curious to know what the thought process was to move away from the previous app that was working perfectly.

reviews.title: Unbelievably bad
reviews.text: Nothing but problems with the app. The county should cancel the contract and go back to the previous company. Can’t add credit card details, asks to select course before displaying non course specific information, doesn’t interface with password history on IOS, new problems every week

reviews.title: Would give negative stars
reviews.text: This app doesn’t even do the one thing it’s supposed to do. The user interface is clunky and unintuitive. I couldn’t make any reservations, view existing reservations, or anything at all. Every update tends to make it worse.

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.text: Horrible app, typical Montgomery county getting rid of something that already works fine.

reviews.title: Password reset issue
reviews.text: When I reset the password, the app sent me a temporary password through my email. However, the temporary password does not work in the app. Now I am out of the app.

reviews.title: Can’t see reservation history
reviews.text: With this version, the app won’t let you see your current reservations.  Keep getting popup to select a course first.  Even if you do, you still get same popup.  Very disappointing app

reviews.title: Terrible app
reviews.text: Does not work

reviews.title: Wow this app vendor is bad
reviews.text: Clearly whoever the county used to do the development is not experienced. Using your old email to create a profile and “forgot password” is app development 101. Please publish the name of this firm because they are terrible. Now the poor guys in the clubhouse and golf professionals are going to be on the receiving end of frustrated residents.  Sadly not surprising. Sorry to the club house guys this is not aimed at you.

reviews.title: Why ?
reviews.text: The old app was great. This thing is worthless. Wasted an hour to get it to recognize my account (same network error others have mentioned). I can log onto the web version but seeing the unorganized tee time display, buggy operation and unintuitive interface I’m not sure I want to store any payment info on this site. Possibly the worst app upgrade I’ve ever experienced. If I have to rely on this, not likely I’ll be playing any rounds and the MGC courses this year which is a shame. Good courses bad decision to change tee time tool.

reviews.title: DOGE Needed Now
reviews.text:
This app is a disaster.  We need  Dept Of Golf Efficiency (DOGE) to straighten this mess out. 

1) Make the filters work

2) Show that a package discount has been applied to the pricing 

3) Tell me if you can’t cancel a reservation

4) Differentiate the executive course from the 18 hole course at places like Needwood.

reviews.title: Network Error
reviews.text: Can’t log in. No help function either. Tried removing and reinstalling. No luck. I can log in on desktop

reviews.title: Worst app ever
reviews.text: Seriously the worst app I’ve ever used please bring back the old chromogolf app to reserve tee times

reviews.title: Brutal
reviews.text: Confusing app, doesn’t specify different courses for needwood, super confusing for booking tee time for multiple people, overall not great experience. Brutal switch that I hope improves before the season ramps up, old app was fine.

reviews.title: Upgrade the “add golfer” feature
reviews.text:
Please update the app so that the “add golfer” pop up allows the user to hit “submit” or “complete” or “approve” or something. The user doesn’t have the ability to complete adding the information for the new golfer because the app doesn’t show anything to click to complete updating the data entry and return back to the main screen.

New app has potential but needs to work out bugs and be responsive to user feedback.

reviews.title: It is not even 1 star quality
reviews.text: This new app is joke.  Default time range for tee time is current time plus 1 hr. So if you open the app at night you have to adjust time to day time.   Also once you make reserve you cannot view detail like how many people, cost and so on like older version.  Another stupid thing is reservation can only list one course when have 9 diff ones.   And we cannot switch courses unless you make another reservation.  All these after raising membership
